text: Zuglói Sport Egyesület was a Hungarian football club from Zugló, Budapest. ==History== Zuglói Sport Egyesület debuted in the 1938–39 season of the Hungarian League and finished ninth. == Name Changes == *1921–1923: Zuglói Nemzeti Torna Egylet *1923: merger with Zuglói Testvériség Futball Club *1923–1939: Zuglói Sport Egyesület *1939: merger with Danuvia SE *1939–1952: Zuglói Danuvia SE *1948: merger with XIV. ker. MaDISz *1952–1953: Vasas Torpedo *1953–1956: Vasas Danuvia *1956–?: Zuglói Danuvia SE *1978: merger with BVG Zuglói SC == References == ==External links== * Profile Category:Football clubs in Hungary Category:1921 establishments in Hungary
title: Zuglói SE
